original_title: Yolanda Adams: Live In Concert...An Unforgettable Evening
overview: A beautiful representation of Yolanda's enormous contribution to the world of Gospel music. Comprised of footage from her two previously released videos. Tracks include: The Only Way, Let Us Worship Him, My Everything, Just A Prayer Away, Through the Storm.
title: Yolanda Adams: Live In Concert...An Unforgettable Evening
